DOC.brief_summary: compare evaluate efficacy safety Ganilever PFS Orgalutran® infertility woman assist reproductive technology
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Evaluate Efficacy Safety Ganilever PFS ( Prefilled Syringe ) Orgalutran®
DOC.criteria: An adult female age 20 39 time screen Patients whose mean menstrual cycle 25 35 day Patients whose FSH ( follicle stimulate hormone ) concentration exceed 13 mIU / mL screen Patients diagnosed infertility due one follow A . Trouble Factors B . Male Factors C. Unexplained D. Uterine factor Patients previous IVF experience le 3 Patient sign write consent hear explanation purpose , method effect clinical trial If sperm donor ( spouse nonspouse ) severe male factor ( Non obstructive azoospermia ) Patients diagnose PCOS ( polycystic ovary syndrome ) screen Patient abnormal uterine bleed screen Patients diagnose primary ovarian failure Patients ovarian cyst relate PCOS screen Patients tubal hydrops Patients untreated nonreproductive endocrine disease Patients deformity reproductive organ conceive , fibroid uterus conceive ( submucosal myoma ) Patients less 2 ovary ( 0 or1 ) Patients ovarian , breast , uterus , hypothalamus , pituitary malignancy Patients BMI < 18 BMI > 30 Patients LH concentration le 1.2mIU / mL screen Poor ovarian responder bologna criterion Patients moderate severe renal impairment ( creatinine clearance < 60 mL / min ) liver function impairment ( ALT AST , > 5 time normal ) Patients experience Grade 4 high OHSS ( ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ) Patients contraindicated pregnancy Patients pregnant lactate Patients hypersensitivity IP Patients participate medicationrelated clinical trial since enrollment study , participate clinical trial within 3 month ( 90 day ) enrol trial
